resources.string: <!DOCTYPE html><html lang=\"en\"><head><base href=\"https://steemit.com/\" target=\"_blank\"><style>img {;max-width: 96%; margin-left: 2%; margin-right: 2%; margin-top: 10pt} a {color: #1FBF8F;} .PostFull__body {padding: 2rem;clear: left;margin: 0 auto;} h1,h2,h3 {padding: auto auto;} div,iframe{ display: block;max-width: 96%; margin-left: 2%; margin-right: 2%; margin-top: 10pt}body {background-color: #fefefe;color: #333;font-family: \"Source Sans Pro\", \"Helvetica Neue\", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;line-height: 1.6;}</style></head>
